references.paper_title: nuScenes: A multimodal dataset for autonomous driving
references.reason: This paper is the source of a benchmark dataset used to evaluate the proposed method.

references.paper_title: BEVFormer: Learning bird's-eye-view representation from multi-camera images via spatiotemporal transformers
references.reason: This paper proposes a method for learning bird's-eye-view representation from multi-camera images, which is directly adopted and extended by the current work.

references.paper_title: MapTR: Structured modeling and learning for online vectorized HD map construction
references.reason: This paper proposes the base frame-level MapNet model which is extended in this work by incorporating temporal information.

references.paper_title: Stream query denoising for vectorized HD map construction
references.reason: This paper is a closely related work that leverages temporal information for improved online prediction of HD map construction.

references.paper_title: MapTRv2: An end-to-end framework for online vectorized HD map construction
references.reason: This paper improves the previous MapTR model and is adopted as the primary frame-level model in this work.
